name: Lost in the presents
description:
Lost in the present.

Adventure of green present in order to run to green light. How delightful. Play with interacitve objects, teleportation and other positive things that I can't imagine. This is game for your brain, not fingers. (Mostly fingers, but you get the point)

Controls:

WASD - move

R - restart level

Complex enought, I guess...

Credits:

Everything - Wister (aka me)

Good luck. Have fun and remember to leave a comment. (You will forget, probably.)
